mapper.insert: insert into stat_shop_daily (SEQUENCEID, YYYY, YYYYMM, YYYYMMDD, SHOPID, SHOPNAME, ORDERNUM, AMOUNT, COST, BADCOST, EXPRESSCOST, NUMBER1, NUMBER2, NUMBER3, COST1, COST2, COST3, FIELD1, FIELD2, FIELD3) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yyyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yyyymm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yyyymmdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordernum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{badcost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{expresscost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{number1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{number2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{number3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cost1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cost2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cost3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{field1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{field2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{field3,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update stat_shop_daily set YYYY = #{yyyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YYYYMM = #{yyyymm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YYYYMMDD = #{yyyymmdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOPID = #{shopid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOPNAME = #{shopname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDERNUM = #{ordernum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COST = #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BADCOST = #{badcost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EXPRESSCOST = #{expresscost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NUMBER1 = #{number1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NUMBER2 = #{number2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NUMBER3 = #{number3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COST1 = #{cost1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COST2 = #{cost2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COST3 = #{cost3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FIELD1 = #{field1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIELD2 = #{field2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIELD3 = #{field3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, YYYY, YYYYMM, YYYYMMDD, SHOPID, SHOPNAME, ORDERNUM, AMOUNT, COST, BADCOST, EXPRESSCOST, NUMBER1, NUMBER2, NUMBER3, COST1, COST2, COST3, FIELD1, FIELD2, FIELD3 from stat_shop_daily where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SEQUENCEID, YYYY, YYYYMM, YYYYMMDD, SHOPID, SHOPNAME, ORDERNUM, AMOUNT, COST, BADCOST, EXPRESSCOST, NUMBER1, NUMBER2, NUMBER3, COST1, COST2, COST3, FIELD1, FIELD2, FIELD3 from stat_shop_daily
